items.summary: Add the 6 newly uploaded images as static frontend assets and ensure they are included in the build output with these exact filenames: IMG-20260208-WA0008-1.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0010-1.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0005-5.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0008-2.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0010-2.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0005-6.jpg.

Keep the existing proposal page layout and interactions intact, but update the photo grid under the main /saesha.jpg image to display all 6 newly uploaded images as the smaller tiles (same grid style/spacing/rounded corners). Use a 2-column grid with 3 rows of small tiles under the main image (main image still spans both columns).

Remove the in-page local photo upload functionality and its UI/state from the proposal page now that the grid is fully static: remove the hidden <input type="file"> element, the "Add photos/Replace photos" button, the clear button, and any related local preview state usage in frontend/src/App.tsx. If the local preview hook is no longer used anywhere, remove its import/usage and clean up any now-unused code.

Preserve graceful fallback behavior for missing images: if any of the static photo assets (including /saesha.jpg) fail to load, render a visually consistent pink-themed placeholder tile that does not break the grid layout.
